column4: Hi All. Just installed 8.10 dual boot with Vista on my vaio. I had gone ahead with guided install but it didn't ask me to create swap partition anywhere. Now, while installing some packages , I am getting errors related to man-db like  "No space left on device"
that has nothing to do with swap, just no space left on your system - how much did you give it?
sounds like you didn't give it enough
